EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Sharankumar (1324321078.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Sharankumar (1324321078.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultant Services Email 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Sharan,
I have forwarded to our CTO. He will reach out if there is some interest.
Have a great holiday,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: sharankumar sivakumar [mailto:sharan107@hotmail.com] Sent: Monday, December 19, 2011 12:54 AM To: Steve Arhancet Cc: iossharan@gmail.com Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Sharankumar
Hi Steve, We went through your website and we have a brief idea of what you are into. A little more info on your vision/plans for mobile applications, would help us suggest what kind of solutions we can provide you.
Our team is currently working on a mobile app for a NGO called ALERT-Emergency Care, which is backed by our government and an e-commerce website Masterkitchen.co.in. These are still in their early stages of development.
We would like to establish our credibility and potential by doing a free of cost Proof Of Concept for any one of your business case. The POC will be a deploy able mobile application which you can test on various devices.
We will take things further solely based on our performance on the POC.
Looking forward to working with you
Thanks Sharan
From: sharan107@hotmail.com To: sarhancet@mbopartners.com Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Sharankumar Date: Sat, 17 Dec 2011 03:36:31 +0000 Hi Steve, That's Great news Steve. Sure, We will get in business with MBO Parnters soon. I and my work partner are observing your website/business thoroughly to give you an idea of what we can offer you. Once I am done with it, I will send you an e-mail with the examples of our work, our capabilities and mainly the Mobile solutions we can offer for MBO Parnters in brief.
Thanks, Sharan. Ph: +91 9176691601 begin_of_the_skype_highlighting +91 9176691601 end_of_the_skype_highlighting. From: sarhancet@mbopartners.com To: sharan107@hotmail.com Date: Thu, 15 Dec 2011 11:40:02 -0500 Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Sharankumar Sharan,
Thanks for the reply; and I’m sure we will be here when the project is right for MBO.
We do have some Mobile needs. Can you please send me some examples of your work, perhaps a short paragraph about your capabilities so that I can send this to my CTO?
Thanks,
Steve
